definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: A lifting handle is arranged on the toaster, which is connected with the switch C.
sentences.chinese: 多士爐上設置有一提手，該提手與開關C相接。

sentences.english: A lifting handle is arranged on the toaster, which is connected with the switch C.
sentences.chinese: 多士爐上設置有一提手，該提手與開關C相接。

sentences.english: What instrument do violists envy most?
sentences.chinese: 什麼樂器是中提手最妒忌的？

sentences.english: Black lacquered finish hardware. Two rolled leather handles with large leather stitching on seam.
sentences.chinese: 黑色硬件，兩跟壓皮提手，上有皮革線縫裝飾。

sentences.english: Next you will determine the length of your handles.
sentences.chinese: 然後就需要決定提手的長度了。

sentences.english: The handle of my suitcase has come off.
sentences.chinese: 我手提箱的提手掉下來了。

sentences.english: On it there is a metal handle to which a label is tied.
sentences.chinese: 提箱上有一個繫着標籤的金屬提手。

sentences.english: With murderous glare in her eyes, she raised the dagger and stabbed at his ear.
sentences.chinese: 那女郎眼露兇光，一提手，匕首便要往他耳中刺落。

sentences.english: The best weights have a handle in the middle for carrying.
sentences.chinese: 最好的重物是有中間有提手方便搬運的那種。

sentences.english: I can' t carry the bucket if the handle is broken.
sentences.chinese: 提手要是壞了我就提不動這桶了。

sentences.english: The invention provides a dismountable pan handle, belonging to the technical field of cooking utensil.
sentences.chinese: 一種脫卸式的鍋提手，屬於炊事用具技術領域。

sentences.english: Why do violists stand for long periods outside people's houses?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼中提手在房子外面站了很長時間？

definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
to close up/to heal (of wound)/to keep one's lips sealed
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)
